item.description:
Topic: Ho'Oponopono

What a great way to start the year by clearing out the old and making things right for yourself.

A rough translation of Ho'Oponopono - to make things right.  Pono actuall means right so you might say to make things doubly right, or  make things right with yourself and the world.

This night will be a hypnotic experience of clearing and releasing anything and everything that has to do with relationships with others and yourself and may have a negative impact on you.

This is not the 4 phrase Self-Identity Ho'Oponopono though we will talk about that, as well.

What a way to start the Year!  Come and be ready to RELAX and RELEASE!

Welcome to everyone intrigued by Hypnosis & Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP). Here are the details of the November meeting of the Greater Boston Hypnosis and NLP group. [b]This month’s topic:

 

 Kevin Martin, CHT

Hypnotist Positive Effects Methuen, MA (978) 494-4542 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com

---------------------------------- Helping people to help themselves

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston Hypnosis and NLP Meetup - Lexington-Ho'Oponopono
